mapper.insert: insert into pf_job_posting( tel, title, content, minimum_career, job, year_salary, start_dated, end_dated, view_count, company_member_no, work_place_no, posting_registration, readable, minimum_education_no, employment_stat_no, field_no, skill_no) values( #{tel}, #{title}, #{content}, #{minimumCareer}, #{job}, #{yearSalary}, #{startDated}, #{endDated}, 0, #{companyMemberNumber}, #{district.districtNumber}, now(), 1, #{finalEducation.educationNumber}, #{employmentStatus.number}, #{field.number}, #{skill.number})
mapper.select: select j.job_posting_no, j.title, j.content, j.minimum_career, j.job, j.year_salary, j.start_dated, j.end_dated, j.view_count, j.posting_registration, j.tel, f.file_path, e.employment_stat_name from pf_job_posting j left outer join pf_job_posting_file f on j.job_posting_no=f.job_posting_no join pf_employment_status e ON j.employment_stat_no = e.employment_stat_no where j.end_dated > now() order by j.job_posting_no desc limit 0, 5

select j.job_posting_no, j.title, j.content, j.minimum_career, j.job, j.year_salary, j.start_dated, j.end_dated, j.view_count, j.posting_registration, f.file_path, e.employment_stat_name from pf_job_posting j left outer join pf_job_posting_file f on j.job_posting_no=f.job_posting_no join pf_employment_status e ON j.employment_stat_no = e.employment_stat_no where end_dated > now() and j.job_posting_no < #{lastNo} order by j.job_posting_no desc limit 0, 5

select j.job_posting_no, j.company_member_no, j.title, j.content, j.minimum_career, j.job, j.year_salary, j.tel, j.start_dated, j.end_dated, j.view_count, f.file_path, e.employment_stat_name, c.name as certificate_name, m.name as major_name, d.name as district_name, i.category, cp.representative, cp.name as company_name, fi.name as field_name, sk.name as skill_name from pf_job_posting j left outer join pf_job_posting_file f on j.job_posting_no=f.job_posting_no join pf_employment_status e on j.employment_stat_no = e.employment_stat_no left outer join pf_company_required_certificate r on j.job_posting_no = r.job_posting_no left outer join pf_certificate c on r.certificate_no = c.certificate_no left outer join pf_company_required_major q on j.job_posting_no = q.job_posting_no left outer join pf_major m on q.major_no = m.major_no left outer join pf_district d on j.work_place_no = d.district_no left outer join pf_final_education i on j.minimum_education_no = i.education_no left outer join pf_company_member as k on k.company_member_no = j.company_member_no left outer join pf_company as cp on cp.company_no = k.company_no left outer join pf_field as fi on j.field_no = fi.field_no left outer join pf_skill as sk on j.skill_no = sk.skill_no where j.job_posting_no=#{jobPostingNumber}

select j.job_posting_no, j.title, j.content, j.minimum_career, j.start_dated, j.end_dated, j.job, j.year_salary, j.view_count, f.file_path, e.employment_stat_name, c.name as certificate_name, m.name as major_name from pf_job_posting j left outer join pf_job_posting_file f on j.job_posting_no = f.job_posting_no join pf_employment_status e on j.employment_stat_no = e.employment_stat_no left outer join pf_company_required_certificate r on j.job_posting_no = r.job_posting_no left outer join pf_certificate c on r.certificate_no = c.certificate_no left outer join pf_company_required_major q on j.job_posting_no = q.job_posting_no left outer join pf_major m on q.major_no = m.major_no where j.title like #{keywordPattern} or j.content like #{keywordPattern} or j.minimum_career like #{keywordPattern} or j.start_dated like #{keywordPattern} or j.end_dated like #{keywordPattern} or j.job like #{keywordPattern} or j.year_salary like #{keywordPattern} or e.employment_stat_name like #{keywordPattern} or c.name like #{keywordPattern} or m.name like #{keywordPattern}

select j.job_posting_no, j.company_member_no, j.title, j.content, j.minimum_career, j.job, j.year_salary, j.start_dated, j.end_dated, j.view_count, j.posting_registration, f.file_path, e.employment_stat_name from pf_job_posting j left outer join pf_job_posting_file f on j.job_posting_no=f.job_posting_no join pf_employment_status e ON j.employment_stat_no = e.employment_stat_no where j.company_member_no=#{companyMemberNumber} order by j.job_posting_no desc limit 0, 5

select j.job_posting_no, j.title, j.content, j.minimum_career, j.job, j.year_salary, j.start_dated, j.end_dated, j.view_count, j.posting_registration, f.file_path, e.employment_stat_name from pf_job_posting j left outer join pf_job_posting_file f on j.job_posting_no=f.job_posting_no join pf_employment_status e ON j.employment_stat_no = e.employment_stat_no where j.company_member_no=#{companyMemberNumber} and now() > date(subdate(j.end_dated,INTERVAL 7 DAY)) order by j.job_posting_no desc

select j.job_posting_no, j.title, c.name as company_name, m.name as member_name, m.email from pf_job_posting j join pf_members m on j.company_member_no=m.member_no join pf_company_member cm on j.company_member_no=cm.company_member_no join pf_company c on cm.company_no=c.company_no where title=#{title}

select j.title, j.minimum_career, j.end_dated, j.logo, c.name as company_name, i.category, d.name as district_name from pf_job_posting j join pf_payment p on j.title = p.apply_posting join pf_company_member cm on j.company_member_no=cm.company_member_no join pf_company c on cm.company_no=c.company_no left outer join pf_final_education i on j.minimum_education_no = i.education_no left outer join pf_district d on j.work_place_no = d.district_no where now() >= p.start_date AND now() < p.end_date order by p.pay_no desc;
